detectors.description:
Secondyfinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#136-141) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#138)
detectors.markdown:
[Secondyfinance.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#L136-L141) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#L138)

detectors.description:
Secondyfinance.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#167-173) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#168)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Secondyfinance.sol#170)
